A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Baaaad. Most scenes were a waste of time and dont go anywhere. The whole visit to the casino planet was messy and ended up costing the rebellion way more than if they hadnt even tried. Am I actually supposed to root for the main characters if they end up indirectly getting everybody killed? All the questions from star wars 7 were answered in a lazy way that lacked any passion.
